room_title: Escape room "High Voltage" by Escape Room Salem in Boston
room_description: The late Scientist, Dr. Conundrum tried to destroy his latest reanimated experiment with lethal doses of High Voltage shock waves. Unfortunately for the good doctor, his equipment failed and he was blown to smithereens! It is up to you and your group of researchers to find the missing parts of the scientist, reassemble his body and revive him long enough for the computer to scan his diabolical brain! May he rest in pieces!
